channel.title: In need of a peaceful server?
channel.description: [FONT="Book Antiqua"][COLOR="DimGray"][SIZE="2"][B][CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Tired of [COLOR=#FF0000]PVP[/COLOR]? Tired of all the [COLOR=#FF0000]raiding[/COLOR]/[COLOR=#FF0000]faction[/COLOR] servers? Tired of moving from [COLOR=#FF0000]server[/COLOR] to [COLOR=#FF0000]server[/COLOR]?[/SIZE][/FONT] [IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/2017/64508734.png[/img] [SIZE=4]Well, I've got a [COLOR=#00FF00]PERFECT SERVER[/COLOR] that you will [COLOR=#00FF00]LOVE[/COLOR], this server has got the the perfect community, perfect admins(AKA [COLOR=#FF0000]S[/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]p[/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00]i[/COLOR][COLOR=#0000FF]r[/COLOR]i[COLOR=#0000FF][COLOR=#DAA520]t[/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR=#0000FF]s[/COLOR]), perfect and well thought permissions, also the latest plugins that will make your gameplay [COLOR=#00FF00]BETTER[/COLOR]! This server mainly uses the "Towny" plugin, which allows you to keep all your property safe! This server has many more features, that cannot be described all in one post! [/SIZE] [IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/2017/64508734.png[/img] [SIZE=4][FONT=Impact]THIS SERVER OFFERS UP TO[/FONT] [SIZE=5][FONT=Arial Black][COLOR=#00FF00][FONT=Impact]9[/FONT][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE] [FONT=Impact]VIP LEVELS[/FONT][/SIZE]: [img]http://www.legendaryisland.com/img/vip/scrolls/vip.jpg[/img] [SIZE=5]More info at: [SIZE=6][COLOR=#FF0000]LI-VIP.COM[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Not feeling like paying? This server also offers a [SIZE=6][COLOR=#006400]"[B]SUPER[/B]"[/COLOR][/SIZE] status, which allows you to have the main VIP features(First picture in spoiler) [COLOR=#00FF00][I]FOR [U]FREE[/U][/I][/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=5]To get the SUPER feature you must play a certain amount of time on the server, after that you'll [SIZE=6][COLOR=#00FF00]auto-magically[/COLOR][/SIZE] be a SUPER member![/SIZE] [IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/2017/64508734.png[/img] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=7][COLOR=#00FF00]LIKED THE SERVER?[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT] [SIZE=5]Come visit us at:[/SIZE] [U][B][SIZE=6]IP[/SIZE][/B][/U]: [SIZE=6]"[SIZE=7][COLOR=#FFA07A][COLOR=#FFFF00]L[/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR=#FFA500]I[/COLOR][COLOR=#FFA500][COLOR=#FFFF00]-[/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00]V[/COLOR][COLOR=#AFEEEE]I[/COLOR][COLOR=#00FFFF]P[/COLOR][COLOR=#ADD8E6].[/COLOR][COLOR=#DDA0DD]C[/COLOR][COLOR=#EE82EE]O[/COLOR][COLOR=#008000][COLOR=#00FF00]M[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]"[/SIZE] [B][U][SIZE=6]Website[/SIZE][/U][/B]: [url=http://www.legendaryisland.com/]? Legendary Island ?[/url] [IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/2017/64508734.png[/img] [SIZE=6][COLOR=#00FF00]FUN[/COLOR]-[COLOR=#FFFF00]FACT[/COLOR]:[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Honeydew, Xephos, and Deadmou5 used to play on this server in 2012, now only they visit it yearly...[/SIZE][/CENTER][/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT]

item.title: In need of a peaceful server?
item.dc:creator: @Nyan_Cat123 Nyan Cat123
item.description:
@Nyan_Cat123 wrote:

[FONT=“Book Antiqua”][COLOR=“DimGray”][SIZE=“2”][CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Tired of [COLOR=#FF0000]PVP[/COLOR]?
Tired of all the [COLOR=#FF0000]raiding[/COLOR]/[COLOR=#FF0000]faction[/COLOR] servers?
Tired of moving from [COLOR=#FF0000]server[/COLOR] to [COLOR=#FF0000]server[/COLOR]?[/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=4]Well, I’ve got a [COLOR=#00FF00]PERFECT SERVER[/COLOR] that you will [COLOR=#00FF00]LOVE[/COLOR], this server has got the the perfect community, perfect admins(AKA [COLOR=#FF0000]S[/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]p[/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00]i[/COLOR][COLOR=#0000FF]r[/COLOR]i[COLOR=#0000FF][COLOR=#DAA520]t[/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR=#0000FF]s[/COLOR]), perfect and well thought permissions, also the latest plugins that will make your gameplay [COLOR=#00FF00]BETTER[/COLOR]!
This server mainly uses the “Towny” plugin, which allows you to keep all your property safe!
This server has many more features, that cannot be described all in one post!
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][FONT=Impact]THIS SERVER OFFERS UP TO[/FONT] [SIZE=5][FONT=Arial Black][COLOR=#00FF00][FONT=Impact]9[/FONT][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE] [FONT=Impact]VIP LEVELS[/FONT][/SIZE]:

[SIZE=5]More info at:
[SIZE=6][COLOR=#FF0000]LI-VIP.COM[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Not feeling like paying?
This server also offers a [SIZE=6][COLOR=#006400]“SUPER”[/COLOR][/SIZE] status, which allows you to have the main VIP features(First picture in spoiler) [COLOR=#00FF00]FOR FREE[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]To get the SUPER feature you must play a certain amount of time on the server, after that you’ll [SIZE=6][COLOR=#00FF00]auto-magically[/COLOR][/SIZE] be a SUPER member![/SIZE]

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=7][COLOR=#00FF00]LIKED THE SERVER?[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=5]Come visit us at:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=6]IP[/SIZE]:
[SIZE=6]"[SIZE=7][COLOR=#FFA07A][COLOR=#FFFF00]L[/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR=#FFA500]I[/COLOR][COLOR=#FFA500][COLOR=#FFFF00]-[/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00]V[/COLOR][COLOR=#AFEEEE]I[/COLOR][COLOR=#00FFFF]P[/COLOR][COLOR=#ADD8E6].[/COLOR][COLOR=#DDA0DD]C[/COLOR][COLOR=#EE82EE]O[/COLOR][COLOR=#008000][COLOR=#00FF00]M[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]"[/SIZE]
[SIZE=6]Website[/SIZE]:
? Legendary Island ?

[SIZE=6][COLOR=#00FF00]FUN[/COLOR]-[COLOR=#FFFF00]FACT[/COLOR]:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Honeydew, Xephos, and Deadmou5 used to play on this server in 2012, now only they visit it yearly…[/SIZE][/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT]

Read full topic
item.source: In need of a peaceful server?
